messages.subject: Art in Armor
messages.msgSnippet: Hello everyone! For those of you interested there is a stunning article in the March issue of Military History magazine called Art in Armor . Absolutely
messages.messageBody:
Hello everyone!

For those of you interested there is a stunning article in the March issue of Military History magazine called 'Art in Armor'.

Absolutely beautiful article dealing with samurai armor. In fact, it is more of a pictorial than an article.

Anyway, just thought I'd let you all know.

Cheers!
Larry
